Package socialmedia

Class Post

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.Post
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Comment, Endorsement, Original
public class Post
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Parent class of all posts.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Post

      public Post​(Account author, java.lang.String contents) throws HandleNotRecognisedException
      Constructor for the SocialMediaPlatform posts.
      Parameters:
      author - Account that created the post.
      contents - Content of the post.
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the handle does not match to any account in the system.

    • Post

      public Post​(int id, java.lang.String contents)
      Post constructor that generates a dummy post, used so that it can be overridden in child objects.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the post.
      contents - the contents of the post.

    • Post

      public Post​(int id)
      Constructor for the SocialMediaPlatform dummy post for deleted posts.
      Parameters:
      id - ID assigned to a deleted post.

  • Method Details

    • removeComment

      public void removeComment​(Comment comment)
      Overridden in Comment.java to remove a comment from a comment's ArrayList
      Parameters:
      comment - the comment object to be removed

    • addComment

      public void addComment​(Comment comment) throws NotActionablePostException
      Method to add Comments to the parent post arraylist so they can be orphaned when the post is deleted.
      Parameters:
      comment - The comment to be added to the arraylist.
      Throws:
      NotActionablePostException - if the handle does not match to any account in the system.

    • setContents

      public void setContents​(java.lang.String contents)
      Setter method for the contents of the post.
      Parameters:
      contents - String contents of a post.

    • isAuthorValid

      public void isAuthorValid​(Account author) throws HandleNotRecognisedException
      Validation method checks if the author of the message is not null.
      Parameters:
      author - The account the comment has come from.
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the handle does not match to any account in the system.

    • addEndorsement

      public void addEndorsement() throws NotActionablePostException
      Adds an endorsement to the counter for a post.
      Throws:
      NotActionablePostException - if the ID refers to a endorsement post. Endorsement posts are not endorsable. Endorsements are not transitive. For instance, if post A is endorsed by post B, and an account wants to endorse B, in fact, the endorsement must refers to A.

    • addEndorsementList

      public void addEndorsementList​(Endorsement endorsement, Post post)
      Adds an endorsement to the current post's comment ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      endorsement - the endorsement object to be added to the comment.
      post - the post the endorsement needs to be added too.

    • removeEndorsement

      public void removeEndorsement()
      Method to remove an endorsement from the endorsement count when the endorsement is deleted.

    • setNewPostId

      public static void setNewPostId​(int newPostId)
      Setter method for NewPostId.
      Parameters:
      newPostId - Internal counter to set postIds in chronological order.

    • getPostType

      public PostType getPostType()
      Returns the type of post.
      Returns:
      The type of post.

    • isPostEndorsable

      public static void isPostEndorsable​(PostType postType) throws NotActionablePostException
      Validation method to check if the post is endorsable.
      Parameters:
      postType - The type of post.
      Throws:
      NotActionablePostException - if the ID refers to a endorsement post. Endorsement posts are not endorsable. Endorsements are not transitive. For instance, if post A is endorsed by post B, and an account wants to endorse B, in fact, the endorsement must refers to A.

    • getEndorsementCount

      public int getEndorsementCount()
      Getter method for endorsementCount
      Returns:
      Endorsement count

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      ToString method to show the details of the post, overridden in child objects.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      Blank string

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString​(int indentationLevel)
      ToString method to show the details of the post, overridden in child objects.
      Parameters:
      indentationLevel - the indentation required for the showPostChildrenDetails method.
      Returns:
      Blank string

    • getAuthor

      public Account getAuthor()
      Returns the post's author.
      Returns:
      The Account object corresponding to the post's author

      Getter method for post id.
      Returns:

      Set the post type for a post.
      Parameters:
      postType - the postType to be set.

    • addDeletedComment

      public void addDeletedComment​(Comment comment)
      Overridden in Original.java, adds comments to an arraylist of deleted posts.
      Parameters:
      comment - the comment to be deleted.
